mapper.select: SELECT id, user_access_token, page_access_token, expires_at, account_type, ig_business_account, creator_account, publish_account, created_at, user_id FROM sns_tokens WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sns_tokens (user_access_token, page_access_token, expires_at, account_type, ig_business_account, creator_account, publish_account, created_at, user_id) VALUES (#{userAccessToken}, #{pageAcessToken}, #{expiresAt}, #{accountType}, #{igBusinessId}, now(), #{userId})
